website_summaries.verdict: Youth swimmers can concentrate on their technique, not their goggles, thanks to these easy-to-adjust, lightweight goggles.
pros: Developed with growing competitive swimmers in mind, this swim goggle includes 3 interchangeable nose bridges to help find the most comfortable fit
Its bungee-cord strap can be instantly adjusted
Silicone eyepiece gaskets are comfortable and fit well
cons: The bungee cord can get slack after several weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Finding swim goggles that fit is difficult. I know from years of experience that price does not necessarily translate to good fit when it comes to child or adult swim goggles. Its often hit-and-miss. I'm very happy with the fit and comfort level of these goggles. They don't fog up or leak water for my boy. No longer fussing every two minutes, complaining, etc. He can concentrate 100% of his focus just on swim stroke! I knew that the bungee cord strap would add to the lack of fidgeting, and I wasn't disappointed. Its much better that standard silicone straps with adjusters that extremely frustrating. I'd buy these goggles again 100 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim team!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's first year on swim team. She had already gone through three pairs of goggles...the straps kept breaking. I was looking for something that would hold better and we found it! She loves the bungee cord for the strap and also likes the way the goggles feel. The bungee straps are easy to put on and once she got them adjusted to her, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is on year-round swim team and her favorite speedo vanquishers strap broke in practice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is on year-round swim team and her favorite speedo vanquishers strap broke in practice. I ordered her a bungee cord and decided based on reviews to try these. She no longer will wear the Speedo goggles and loves the blue tint and fit. I ordered another pair to have as a spare. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly uncomfortable. Was looking for a replacement for the Speedo Vanquisher and this is not it. The gasket is thin and does not align with the eye pieces. The eye pieces are very deeep and pinch the bridge of my nose badly. Perhaps not fit for wider man faces.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst swim goggles I have ever tried! Pros:Nice looking and a good storage case. Cons: Terrible fit! It is like wearing two steel rings on your eyes. Very little eye padding; hurts the eye sockets. It comes with 3 different bridge attachments--none of which made it comfortable to wear. The attachments themselves are next to impossible to remove to change out. And even then, none prevented leaking. I would not recommend these at all. I should have paid attention when Fakespot gave it an "F" review grade.
customer_reviews.author: swd

customer_reviews.title: Water links in
customer_reviews.text: I was under the assumption these were kids. My nephew could not wear without water coming in. I changed nose pieces to make smaller or bigger also and nothing worked. Will be sending back. To bad though because I love how they did the elastic that goes around your head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goggles! They don't fog up, you don't get water inside. Very easy to adjust without ripping my hair out. I definitely think these are one of the best pair we have up to this point. Worth every cent. Comes with a nice protective case and a cleaning cloth as well. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rottie lover

customer_reviews.title: Looks decent but nose piece issues
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with multiple nose pieces. Only one and then there is some sort of packaging error where it looks like they included the holders for nose piece and not the actually pieces themselves. I swam competitively for decades so I don’t think it’s me. This was an issue because the fit was terrible and badly squeezed the bridge of both my nose and my son’s nose. Otherwise everything else seems decent, but unfortunately we could not even use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son and they seem to get water in them easy maybe because they are for an adult? He is 10 years old. I ordered them because I thought the strap would be easier than the other straps that we have used on previous goggles but he won’t even wear them because they seem to get water in them easy
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Price On What Seem to be High End Goggles
customer_reviews.text: So far so good and at an amazing price to boot! Got these for one of our swimmers. We've gone through too many pairs of $20-30 goggles that keep breaking at the strap. Strap on these seem much better and won't get snagged in her hair! Easy to adjust as well. First competition is tomorrow! Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Dogtired

customer_reviews.title: Strap slips thru lock easily
customer_reviews.text: Just got this google for my son who is doing competitive swimming. I'd prefer him to adjust the tightness during daily practice so the goggle hold during block diving. But the one we got have a bad lock, and the strap slips easily without pushing down lock. My son had not tried it yet, but he feel it will move during block driving.
customer_reviews.author: MitchGu

customer_reviews.title: Just what my daughter needed!
customer_reviews.text: So great, we bought 2 pairs!! They are anti fog and have enough tint to help filter out the sunlight since she uses them at an outdoor pool. Super comfy and adjustable too.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: They do fog, but CS is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 3 stars for the “anti-fog”. They fogged up about 5 mins after putting them on! This has nothing to do with the customer service. Product arrived quick and o would give 5 stars for that. Hopefully I can return them.
customer_reviews.author: lori e

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of seim school. We may have found a favorite! My son has only used this for 1 lesson but I see the difference. No more tugging and leaks. Will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to change the front nose bridge to a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to change the front nose bridge to a smaller one, and after replacing it, it came off a few times. My daughter was fussy about the bungee straps because without a swim cap, it bungee straps kept sliding down to the lower back of her head, and that made the fit lose right away. We are keeping this as a spare right now. I think it would be okay to use over a swim cap. It won't be our primary pair of swim goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Berry

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable goggles and raccoon eyes
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry these goggles are very hard on the surface of your eyeball. They give you raccoon eyes and are really uncomfortable compare to other products I have bought. I was trying to buy something cheap but in my experience it's not worth it here.
customer_reviews.author: amazonist

customer_reviews.title: Needs a stronger press clip.
customer_reviews.text: The button used to hold and keep the strings tight wont stay put. Its just not strong enough to keep the goggles secure. My daughter kept getting water in here eyes because the strings would come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Not the best goggles for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my children feel these are comfortable goggles. We will go back to the speedo vanquisher goggles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R. Villalba

customer_reviews.title: they squeeze your nose really bad leaving red marks that took hours to go away
customer_reviews.text: Really uncomfortable, they squeeze your nose really bad leaving red marks that took hours to go away, In between the nose pieces is not wide enough even with the biggest nose piece. I don't have a big nose, and i haven't ever had this problem with goggles before.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Strings fitted all wrong
customer_reviews.text: My son could not use as the strings were fitted wrong because of which they could not be tightened
customer_reviews.author: mast-mast

customer_reviews.title: “They are amazing! ” he claims
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are a quality product we are confident in recommending. My son wears contacts and has to swim in PE class. We ordered these with hopes they would be effective. “They are amazing!” he claims. He can clearly see underwater, there are no leakage issues, and they provide comfortable wear. We ordered a second pair for our daughter!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite pair of goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are my new favorite pair of goggles for the following reasons: 1. They are comfortable and they don't fall off my head. 2. They don't leak and fog up much (there is a bit of fog after a long time with out getting rinsed off, as most goggles do.) 3.they are easy to get on and off. Overall they are one of the best goggles I've seen yet for a reasonable price . The only problem I have is the strap slips every once in a while .
customer_reviews.author: alyssa l.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 soon to be 4 yr old son. He is in swim lessons and loves wearing goggles. Well after two other pairs of goggles (other brands) I found these ones. They are simple for him to put on and take off and according to him they fit well and he’s happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Silva

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok
customer_reviews.text: Good product for what it is, I am not a fan of the bungee style for my kids. It will not stay on their head tight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Altman

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son to use on the local swim team, after his old goggles broke. So far they seem to working really well! He says the anti-fog coating on them is amazing, so much so that he has difficulties concentrating on his coach and wants to be under water looking around!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My children are competitive swimmers these goggles work well for summer swim meets. Love the bungee cord! After using a bungee, we will never use rubber straps again!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst goggles ever. The string is too taught, which doesn't allow any give no matter how loose. OUCH!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wow what great customer service!!! I contacted them about the goggles and received a fast response and great service. My 7 year old daughter used these goggles for summer swim team and loved them. With the bungee cord strap it makes adjusting the goggles super super easy! I had several other swimmers and parents wanting a pair as well. I would highly recommend these goggles and the supplier!
customer_reviews.author: TwinsPlusOne

customer_reviews.title: Like the straps
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them in the water yet, but so far, they are just like described.
customer_reviews.author: ACSC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were too hard on my eye sockets - they did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha K. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Rubber seal pops out
customer_reviews.text: The rubber seal around the lenses keeps on popping out when my daughter uses it for swimming. It’s unfortunate since she really likes the goggle. Not sure if all of them are like that or we just got a defected ones. I am returning this goggle for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JNCMom

customer_reviews.title: Only a grandsons dream glasses
customer_reviews.text: My grands say the are the bomb!! Fit great and look so good
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Love these goggles
customer_reviews.text: Love these goggles! I got these because I wear contact lenses and needed protection from the water as well as the sun. These goggles were the perfect combination for both! Fit comfortably and allows me to enjoy swimming with my kids
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: It fit my 4 year old:
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these goggles for my 4 year old. I was worried they might not fit since the description minimum age was 7. I switched out the connecting piece above the nose to a size small and it worked great. My son used them for the first time last night at his swim lesson and there were no issues. I might re-purchase these for my older son. The goggles came with a small, medium, and large connecting piece.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect fit on my 7 year old! She is no longer spending time messing with her goggles during swim practice and I don't have to spend time adjusting then before practice anymore! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Googles look and feel good
customer_reviews.text: The google case was broken when it arrived, but Amazon replace it soon afterwards. My daughter loves her new googles.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and are easy to put on, remove, and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. George

customer_reviews.title: Good until they broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 2 weeks 😔 cracked where the nosepiece meets the eye part.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny2penny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 9 year old she is a competitive swimmer and they don't slip or got at all great product
customer_reviews.author: samma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. I used similar ones on high school for racing. She says they fit and work very well. Good job and nice packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Qbert5150

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish there were instructions on how to tighten the goggles.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Loose straps
customer_reviews.text: The goggles fit well after adjusting when my son tried them on. Upon entering the water, they became loose and leaked water inside.
customer_reviews.author: Toya R.

customer_reviews.title: They are really worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These googles are great. I have bought many googles that say they won't leave red marks, but they always do except for these googles. These googles also do not fog up on you in the middle of a race or come off of your eyes. They are really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My children love these goggles
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these goggles. Very easy to adjust and they can do it on their own! No more struggling with rubber straps that weaken throughout the swim season. Good quality and user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Bbarnett

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great! They block they water and the sun and don't fog! The straps are adjustable, providing comfort and they don't pull on your hair. Very happy with these goggles! and they were delivered super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Joahnna

customer_reviews.title: ... of now wife hasn't used them but seems to like the quality an fitment
customer_reviews.text: Can only give it 4 as of now wife hasn't used them but seems to like the quality an fitment
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter got these to use for competitive swimming and says they are excellent! No leaking, comfortable, easy to put on. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this brand of goggles. They are great quality and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Knowledgeable customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the straps!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and the straps adjust nicely and don't pull hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki STL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Terrible goggles - they don’t fit properly on anyone’s face. There’s a gap between face and goggles. NOT worth the MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Seller was great, shipped immediately and packed well
customer_reviews.text: Seller was great, shipped immediately and packed well. The goggles themselves were not great. Not ideal for everyday use, nose pieces never stayed in and once in the dig into the bridge of your nose.
customer_reviews.author: MelisaV

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Original strap had to be replaced almost immediately and still didn’t fit as should. Leaked no matter which nose piece used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not leak-proof
customer_reviews.text: They looked nice when they arrived, but water leaks into the goggles. Two kids tried them.
customer_reviews.author: bobble02

customer_reviews.title: Fast service!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them he needs them for water polo!
customer_reviews.author: GABRIELA D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair I’ve bought for my daughter. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lake

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can adjust the nose bridge spacing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 10 year old who is on a swim team. I love that you can adjust the nose bridge spacing to fit her. So far so good..five after five, the water stays out and still no fog!
customer_reviews.author: SaliChan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.  Easy adjustment for proper fit!
customer_reviews.text: They came in just in time, as promised. My daughter loves how comfortable they are and so easy for her to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The ability to tighten them easily while on your head is the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are for my son and he loves them. He lost his last pair so we got a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Pringlesandpups

customer_reviews.title: The strap is the best.
customer_reviews.text: My son just broke his previous pair with elastic strap, by continuously removing it to clean the fog. These are the perfect goggles for him.
customer_reviews.author: Eriola

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Dislike. Water always got into the eyes no matter how tight they were.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable fitting
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like that it caused a lot of pressure around nose and left redness. Uncomfortable fitting
customer_reviews.author: claudia Arias

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, great price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 12 and swims every day for a team. These goggles came with a nice hard case, 3 different nose pieces (for sizing) and the bungee is a good quality, thick elastic.
customer_reviews.author: SarahDuke

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, keep getting loose
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit , uncomfortable around the nose brings , and keeps getting loose . First swim in these goggles !
customer_reviews.author: raya massoud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and adjust
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old daughter on swim team uses and likes very much. Easy to put on and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Burz

customer_reviews.title: Cool. Solved my sweat problem.
customer_reviews.text: Works for my little girl in swim class. Comfortable and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Norlen J. Ewell

customer_reviews.title: this product not bad and has enough sealing and comfort for the
customer_reviews.text: this product not bad and has enough sealing and comfort for the price
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: They squeezed my nose really hard. They hurt
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust but they really hurt my nose. They squeezed it really really hard.
customer_reviews.author: C&C

customer_reviews.title: They stay on good and water stays out
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My daughter didn't like them but I do. She said she likes clear lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The rubber around the eye piece of the goggles just broke after only 4 weeks of use ugh!
customer_reviews.author: april griffin

customer_reviews.title: best goggles
customer_reviews.text: the only goggles that fit perfectly and do not break!
customer_reviews.author: Zofia Siuta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Breaking them in as competition goggles, and they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They were perfectly for my 11 year old daughter who is getting into competitive swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came in a case. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Kids couldn’t get hem to fit. I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, lets water in, falls off when diving, hurts eyes because it's so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Test Mode

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great for my 8 year old on swim team and I love the easy adjuster....great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Anti-Fog Juniors Racing Swimming Goggles - by Proswims with Quick Adjustable Elastic Bungee Strap, Hard Case and Bonus Swim Goggles Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
product_meta.description:
Do your Kids love to swim?


Are they fed up of leaking, fogging, uncomfortable swimming goggles?


Well, they need the Proswims Antifog Racing Swimming Goggles! 


Lovingly designed from the highest quality polycarbonate shell, these goggles have been carefully designed to be the best in every possible way!

With our unique bungee cord stap and quick snap toggle, you will find putting these googles on and off at just the right tension an absolute breeze. Couple that with our specially formulated anti-fog coating and our wide-angle viewing design, you will be gauranteed a cystal clear view and a comfortable, enjoyable swim at the pool. 

Here are some of the reasons why you NEED Proswims in your life:

 * Our super tough, anti-scratch, tinted shatter proof Polycarbonate lenses come with a specially formulated anti-fog coating guaranteed to keep them fog free!
 * Our unique bungee cord swimming goggle strap is super strong, extremely comfortable, and so easy to adjust & fit that you will be amazed at its superior ease of use and comfort. So much better than traditional silicone straps, our goggles will be loved by competitive, recreational, racing and triathlon swimmers alike.
 * Featuring a high nose bridge and 3 interchangeable, super tough, nose pieces, these goggles are guaranteed to fit ages 7-12. These are suitable racing goggles.
 * Proswims professional swim goggles feature the softest silicon gasket we could find, giving you the most comfortable fit & an air-tight leak-proof seal. Not only that but our goggles come with a high quality protective hard case, to keep your goggles safe, and scratch free. For a limited time only we have included a free BONUS Proswims microfiber cleaning cloth to wipe down your goggles and keep them clean & free of water.
feature_bullets: JUNIORS MIRRORED, UV COATED & SPECIALLY FORMULATED ANTI FOG COATING THAT NEVER FOGS UP - Our super tough, anti-scratch, shatter proof Polycarbonate lenses come with a specially formulated anti-fog coating guaranteed to keep them fog free! Pair that with our mirror finish, UV protection coating and our special wide angle design, you are absolutely guaranteed a crystal clear view at all times.

THE COMFIEST, EASIEST TO ADJUST, BUNGEE CORD RACING GOGGLES AVAILABLE - Our unique bungee cord swimming goggle strap is super strong, extremely comfortable, and so easy to adjust & fit that you will be amazed at its superior ease of use and comfort. So much better than traditional silicone straps, our goggles will be loved by competitive, recreational, racing and triathlon swimmers.

INCLUDED NOSE BRIDGES FIT AGE 7-12, AND NEVER BREAK - Featuring a high nose bridge and 3 interchangeable, super tough, nose pieces, these goggles are guaranteed to fit ages 7-12. These are suitable competition level sports goggles for juniors.

MORE FEATURES & BONUS ITEMS THAN ANY OTHER PREMIUM SWIMMING GOGGLES AVAILABLE - Proswims professional swim goggles feature the softest silicon gasket we could find, giving you the most comfortable fit & an air-tight leak-proof seal. Not only that but our goggles come with a high quality protective hard case, to keep your goggles safe, and scratch free. For a limited time only we have included a free BONUS Proswims microfiber cleaning cloth to wipe down your goggles and keep them clean.

BULLETPROOF LIFE TIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Not 100% satisfied with your purchase? - you have 30 days for a no questions asked return & refund of your product - Something wrong with your goggles? We offer a LIFE TIME GUARANTEE for any faults or problems with the goggles, other than reasonable wear and tear. Money back or instant replacement - it's up to you!
